Eye Library

Manager: Julie Shepherd

Buckshorn Lane, Eye
IP23 7AZ

Tel: 01379 870515
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Eye Library Friends

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: free parking available
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: A4 available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 0900 – 1300
Wednesday 0900 – 1300, 1400 – 1800
Thursday 1400 – 1700
Friday 0900 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Saturday 0900 – 1300
Sunday 1000 – 1500

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Art and craft activities for children

Sunday, 1000-1500

No need to book. Under 8s must be accompanied by an adult.

Baby Bounce

Monday, 1015-1045

Soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies, no need to book.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Scratch coding club: for children aged 8+

every other Saturday, 1030-1200

Term-time only. Join the waiting list by contacting Julie Shepherd at the library. Restarts 15 September.

Tot Rock

Monday, 1100-1200

Songs and action rhymes for toddlers, no need to book.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Reading groups

Chatterbooks reading group for 4-7 year olds

Sunday once a month, 1400-1500

Next session 2 September, topic 'Meerkats'.

Reading group

second Monday of the month, 1930-2030

Fundraising, stalls & book sales

Eye Library Friends pop up café

every other Tuesday, 1030-1200
